EmailTemplate.subject: Opportunity Follow Up – Mr/Ms {!Opportunity.Name} in {!Opportunity.Customer_City__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Partner,
We recently provided you with the contact details of Mr. / Ms. {!Opportunity.Name} who is interested in having a SunPower solar system installed in {!Opportunity.City_Location__c}. We kindly ask you to confirm within the next 24 hours that you have contacted this customer; otherwise we will need to assign this opportunity to a different Partner.
In order to provide us with an update, you can either update the Opportunity stage field in the Partner Portal or simply reply to this email.
We thank you in advance for your cooperation.
Kind regards,
Agent’s Name | SunPower Customer Service Representative - UK SUNPOWER | 08082818718 | sunpoweruk@sunpowercorp.com
